title: Ticket #344: Change condor_submit error messages
description:
We should fix the condor_submit error messages when there are no Condor daemons present. Currently condor_submit displays the current error: 

  C:\condor-jobs\java>condor_submit simple.sub


  ERROR: No credential stored for burnett@Agrajag


        Correct this by running:
        condor_store_cred add

Which is not only unexpected but is also rather misleading. It is more likely that it should mention something about no being able to connect to a schedd (especially when there is no credd enabled in the pool).
